Pre-Game Insights: The Magic have gone 13-4 at home and are known for their strong team defense, allowing 103.4 points per game while opponents shoot 46.4%.
The Jazz are struggling on the road, allowing 119.2 points per game, the most in the Western Conference, and opponents shoot 48.2% against them.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is a non-conference showdown between the Jazz (8-25, 14th in Western Conference) and the Magic (21-15, 4th in Eastern Conference).
The Magic score 105.6 points per game, while the Jazz allow 119.2 points per game, highlighting a significant disparity in their performances.
Others: The game is set to take place in Orlando, Florida, at 6:30 p.m. EST with a betting line of Magic -6.5 and an over/under of 212.
Key players to watch include Jalen Suggs for the Magic and John Collins for the Jazz.
